PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Table 1 shows the optical band - gaps ( E opt g ) of all polymers estimated from the corresponding UV - vis absorption onset.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Table - a table is a collection of data or information, in this case, showing the optical band gaps of polymers.
2. E opt g - "E opt g" is an abbreviation for "optical band gap," which is a property of a material that represents the energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) of the material.
3. UV-vis absorption onset - "UV-vis absorption onset" refers to the wavelength of light at which a material absorbs the most amount of light. In this context, it is a property of the polymers being studied.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. E opt g - "E opt g" is an abbreviation for "optical band gap," which is a material property that represents the energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) of a material.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| E opt g |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
